name: Caveman Noir
description:
Caveman Noir takes you through the epic journey of "Deg Ugtiv", an angry caveman with a gritty sense of deduction skills. Something horrible has happened in his primitive society, and nothing will stop him finding out what went down on this faithful morning!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Made in 72-hours for the Ludum Dare Jam by Mathias "Simex", Henrik "Hengen", Malcolm "Wiz"and Trym "HelloMyNameIsPig"

Tools:
Unity 5
Photoshop
3DsMax
ZBrush
Blender
3dCoat
and good old notepad

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

DIRECTIONS:
Click on the screen to move your character where you want to go, follow your mission objective in the right corner for clues on what to do. Have fun immersing yourself in our adventure.

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
